abstract: Sprite, sold by the Coca-Cola Company, will be called “The Spark” in ads inspired by the brand’s logo.
snippet: Sprite, sold by the Coca-Cola Company, will be called “The Spark” in ads inspired by the brand’s logo.
lead_paragraph: A soft-drink brand that could use a spark to reignite its once-strong growth in its home market is getting a new campaign based on that concept.

headline.main: Sprite Recast as Spark in a Bottle
